item.title: Simple Resx String Fetcher for Asp.Net Core
item.description: As I write this, it should be also filed under the “Enough with the never ending REST apis” Category. This Api will eventually be implemented in my Facebook GraphQL work. Background I wanted a single REST api that would be able to fetch all strings in a Resx for a given language. Furthermore, I should be able to pick how those strings were to be packaged. Some developers like object trees, others might need json arrays that look more like database records.
